description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Oval track racing inspired by British stock car racing where contact is encouraged and necessary to win. Crash and bang your way to victory with 5 player online multiplayer or practice and experiment with physics in single play test drive mode.
description.short: Oval track racing inspired by British stock car racing where contact is encouraged and necessary to win. Crash and bang your way to victory with 5 player online multiplayer or practice and experiment with physics in single play test drive mode.
